TEXT.English: Accept
TEXT.Chinese: Accept

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
TXT_KEY_CONGRESS_ACCEPT_DECISION Accept the decision and leave the city
<<<<<<< HEAD 同意放弃该城 ======= Accept the decision and leave the city >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Attempt to bribe their representatives (%s2: %d1 [ICON_GOLD])
TEXT.Chinese: Attempt to bribe their representatives (%s2: %d1 [ICON_GOLD])

TEXT.English: The congress is currently debating the %s2 claim on our city of %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?
TEXT.Chinese: The congress is currently debating the %s2 claim on our city of %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?

TEXT.English: %s1 opinion on our claim on the %s2 city of %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 opinion on our claim on the %s2 city of %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?

TEXT.English: %s1 opinion on our request to colonize the %s2 territory near %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 opinion on our request to colonize the %s2 territory near %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?

TEXT.English: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They have voted against our claim, and our relations have soured in consequence.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They have voted against our claim, and our relations have soured in consequence.

TEXT.English: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now support our claim.
TEXT.Chinese: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now support our claim.

TEXT.English: The congress is currently debating the %s2 request to colonize our territory near %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?
TEXT.Chinese: The congress is currently debating the %s2 request to colonize our territory near %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?

TEXT.English: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They will now support the claim against us, and our relations have soured in consequence.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They will now support the claim against us, and our relations have soured in consequence.

TEXT.English: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now vote against the claim against us.
TEXT.Chinese: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now vote against the claim against us.

TEXT.English: Unfortunately, we lack the means to do anything.
TEXT.Chinese: Unfortunately, we lack the means to do anything.

TEXT.English: Average
TEXT.Chinese: Average

TEXT.English: High
TEXT.Chinese: High

TEXT.English: Very High
TEXT.Chinese: Very High

TEXT.English: It is now our turn to make a demand.
TEXT.Chinese: It is now our turn to make a demand.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
TXT_KEY_CONGRESS_CORRUPTION_ENEMY They refused our proposal with indignation. Now they might even vote against our interests!

<<<<<<< HEAD 他们拒绝受贿。 ======= They refused our proposal. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TXT_KEY_CONGRESS_CORRUPTION_REQUEST We can use some of our gold to try to bribe another civilization to vote for our interests. Do you want to attempt?
<<<<<<< HEAD 我们可以用金钱贿赂其他文明根据我们的利益投票。你愿意进行这种尝试吗？ ======= We can use some of our gold to try to bribe another civilization to vote for our interests. Do you want to attempt? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TXT_KEY_CONGRESS_CORRUPTION_YES They accepted our proposal. They will vote for our interests.
<<<<<<< HEAD 他们接受了贿赂。他们将根据我们的利益投票。 ======= They accepted our proposal. They will vote for our interests. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: The congress has decided to hand over our city of %s2 to %s1. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.Chinese: The congress has decided to hand over our city of %s2 to %s1. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3

TEXT.English: The congress has decided to allow %s1 to colonize our territory near %s2. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.Chinese: The congress has decided to allow %s1 to colonize our territory near %s2. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
TXT_KEY_CONGRESS_HUMAN_REQUEST What city shall we ask for?
<<<<<<< HEAD 我们应该要求哪座城市? ======= What city shall we ask for? >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TXT_KEY_CONGRESS_INTRO A new international Congress is about to start.[NEWLINE]The leaders of some of the most important nations will meet there to discuss the balance of the world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each side will have its turn to ask a city; if the decision is approved the owner of the city that is being traded must accept it.[NEWLINE]If you refuse a decision, you are likely to face a war against some of the sides that voted YES.
<<<<<<< HEAD 一次国际会议即将召开。[NEWLINE]各主要国家的领袖齐聚一堂讨论如何保持世界的力量平衡。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]各方均有机会要求一座城市的统治权，如在会议上获得通过，则城市现在的所有者必须接受。[NEWLINE]如果你拒绝接受会谈结果，可能与投下赞成票的国家开战。 ======= A new international Congress is about to start.[NEWLINE]The leaders of some of the most important nations will meet there to discuss the balance of the world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each side will have its turn to ask a city; if the decision is approved the owner of the city that is being traded must accept it.[NEWLINE]If you refuse a decision, you are likely to face a war against some of the sides that voted YES. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TXT_KEY_CONGRESS_INTRO_NOT_INVITED A World Congress is being held, but we haven't been invited. Maybe we aren't important enough.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Now we can only await their decisions and trust in their common sense.
<<<<<<< HEAD 一次国际会议正在召开，但我们未获邀请。也许因为我们还不够强大。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]目前我们只能期待他们的会谈能有合理的结果。 ======= A World Congress is being held, but we haven't been invited. Maybe we aren't important enough.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Now we can only await their decisions and trust in their common sense. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A new international congress is being held. The leaders of the world's most important civilizations convene to discuss the balance of the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization is allowed to either claim a city or request to colonize unsettled territory. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A new international congress is being held. The leaders of the world's most important civilizations convene to discuss the balance of the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization is allowed to either claim a city or request to colonize unsettled territory. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A world congress is being held, but we haven't been invited. Apparently we are not important enough. The fate of the world is now in the hands of the following civilizations:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Now we can only await their decisions and trust in their common sense.
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A world congress is being held, but we haven't been invited. Apparently we are not important enough. The fate of the world is now in the hands of the following civilizations:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Now we can only await their decisions and trust in their common sense.

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. We were not involved, but were still invited due to our international importance. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization on the winning side of the war is allowed to claim a city from the losing side, while the civilizations that have lost may reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. We were not involved, but were still invited due to our international importance. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization on the winning side of the war is allowed to claim a city from the losing side, while the civilizations that have lost may reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Since we are on the winning side we can claim cities from the losers of the war, while they may attempt to reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Since we are on the winning side we can claim cities from the losers of the war, while they may attempt to reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a loser of the war we can attempt to reclaim cities lost during the war, while the winners may make additional claims against us. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a loser of the war we can attempt to reclaim cities lost during the war, while the winners may make additional claims against us. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The belligerents convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world, but we were neither involved nor important enough to influence the process:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a non-belligerent, nobody can claim our cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The belligerents convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world, but we were neither involved nor important enough to influence the process:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a non-belligerent, nobody can claim our cities.
